visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the main background (opacity 0.03) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (10-20%) for structure. Active elements get brighter borders.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Avoid heavy drop shadows. Use 'glow' effects (colored shadows) for active states.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and overlays, but keep opacity high (90%+) for legibility.

motion.loading: Pulse effects or 'scanning' line animations for progress bars.

login_background.description: Abstract digital network texture for login page background

report_cover.description: Dark electronic device/server room for report cover page

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/ibm-plex-sans', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Extend the font family theme.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, ALWAYS apply the custom styles defined in 'components'. Do not use the default rounded-md styles.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the Sidebar Layout structure. The sidebar should be fixed, and main content scrollable.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style the tooltips to match the 'Card' style (dark bg, border). Use the semantic colors for data series.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards) has a unique data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
